summary: A test suite that verifies the functionality of the EinsumDense layer, checking its basic computation, constraint enforcement, LoRA integration, and support for various quantization schemes (float8, int8) under different dtype policies and edge‑case scenarios.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the reliability of the EinsumDense implementation within a machine‑learning framework, ensuring it works correctly with low‑rank adaptation and quantization features and gracefully handles improper configurations.
